message:
You needn't worry about ur sensitive/important data again from bad/obtrusive  guys 3:) ... easily give 'em ur device/account after entering the fake password/pattern ... 

ur account/device will have 2 passwords
1st >> leads to real device with ur data
2nd >> leads to fake device with fake date

#Python small project Demo ... 
Please who can co-operate with me developing this idea with native java for android ^_^ ? it's an easy one ... just a lock screen ... and hide files program .. mix together to get our project done
story: Osama Soliman shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Microsmsm/SecondWayPassword
caption: github.com
description: SecondWayPassword - This is small project .. a 2nd way password to protect u from bad guys by entering a fake password which will lead to fake date

data.message: Fake account. Lol :D that's a lot to hide.
yea 3:) enough to be jailed the next 10 years xD ! -hv u read the code :D ?-
u can rather create fake files and encrypt data them than doing another password.
it's an easy option when u have pattern in ur hand ... and in a tight situation ... just go along with the fake password/pattren
or i didn't got what u said Ahmed ?
It's cool, but encrypting the data is better. never the less, we shouldn't have to encrypt anything and live free in your country unless you are creating criminal thing.
I don't want to talk about politics here it's a Raw programming topic .. but I hv sent u an Inbox ^_^
Smart idea, Good luck, I would love to see it soon as Android App.

I like the idea very much :D I got similar feature on my LG G3 phone :D another password will result in guest environment where I choose backgrounds and specific content to show including apps and assets 
even settings can be restricted

Ahmed Abdelrahim thx :) 
Essam A. Hassan can u check ur mobile and tell me the name of the feature so I can search it, please ^_^ ? ... 

please if u can help me rewrite the description of this project or have name suggestions ... I will be very happy to hear it <3 
unfortunately ... u know :D computer only understand coders xD !

seems someone solved that problem before me :) ! on LG devices .. 
Anyway I liked that I tried to do something ... 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mxy7VpIWTRU
This was done on Truecrypt although on a low hard disk encryption level.

I think to deceive attacker with fake data is better than telling him data is encrypted break it :D 
Or ...  both, encrypting original data and misleading to fake data is much better! :v
